title: Client wont even open?
body:
The problem that I have is whenever I go to open the client launcher I get an error pop up saying some sort of " .lib " file is missing. I've tried to fix it by finding online solutions and such, but none of the content I am trying to find is working. I have installed Leauge of Legends maybe 4 times since the first issue, and this happens every time I try to open the client. Once I download the game the client automatically pops up, so I have no trouble using it the first time, but then whenever I exit the client I get the error message stated above. I kind of don't want to keep on downloading the Leauge of Legends game all over again every time I want to play, it takes like 30 or so min, but still. And I have looked for malware or virus and malware, and none of that was detected. So I don't really know what the problem was. 

 {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
There might be a few files in the client that weren't updating or applied properly. Follow the steps in the image I'm linking below, and let me know if that fixes it!
